This is a list of good material I found on various ML techniques. Some you might want to explore them deeper in later posts. Some will just stay as they are here.



Neural Networks Times Series

Best explaination in the world wide web for LSTM models architecture.

A good cheat sheet on RNN. On the website you can find other similar scripts for other Neural Networks Architectures.

Regression Methods

Support Vector Regression.

This is an interesting technique. It draws on the idea of SVM.

Restricted Bolzmann Machine

Good intro into Restricted Bolzmann Machines.

In general a good source for all of the ML/DL algorithm. Not heuristics…. goes into the math. Good when you want to go into it.

http://deeplearning.net/tutorial/rbm.html
